Dialogues.speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.narration: As the sun sets, you walk into the room and find a mysterious letter on the table.
Dialogues.text: You open the letter and begin reading. It says, 'You must make a choice: take the left path, or the right.'

Dialogues.speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.narration: As the sun sets, you walk into the room and find a mysterious letter on the table.
Dialogues.text: You feel a chill as you decide your fate. Left Path it is then.

Dialogues.speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.narration: As the sun sets, you walk into the room and find a mysterious letter on the table.
Dialogues.text: You feel a warmth as you decide your fate. Right path it is then.
